provider_title_3: Copilots or Real Time AI Agent Assist for Providers
provider_des_1: Enable patients to schedule, reschedule, or cancel appointments. Reduce no-shows with smart reminders and ensure optimal scheduling efficiency for providers and staff.
provider_des_2: Automate billing inquiries and payment assistance, helping patients understand charges, verify insurance details, and make secure payments. Reduce administrative workload while improving payment collection rates with conversational AI for healthcare.
provider_des_3: Internal clinical staff and CSRs can automate workflows, training, and access knowledge bases or EHR systems. It listens to patient-support interactions, suggesting the next steps or triage. QA compliance officer ensures professional conduct of agents.
provider_des_4: Enhance patient interactions with AI-powered automation in healthcare across voice, chat, email, and text/SMS. LEXI provides instant responses, proactive updates & seamless support. She is multi-lingual and can be deployed on 15+ digital channels (MS Teams, WhatsApp, Telegram, etc.)
provider_des_5: Automate the first point of contact. From self-service appointment booking to answering general inquiries, LEXI reduces wait times and improves overall patient satisfaction.
payer_title_4: Copilots or Real Time AI Agent Assist for Payers
payer_des_1: Automate billing & payment inquiries, claim status updates, coverage explanations and payment resolutions with conversational AI for healthcare. Ensure accurate reimbursements, reduce delays, and enhance member or patient satisfaction with real-time support.
payer_des_2: Automation in healthcare can help verify member coverage details, co-pays, deductibles, and benefits â€“ eliminating the need for long wait times and repetitive inquiries.
payer_des_3: Instantly verify patient eligibility across multiple insurance plans, reducing delays and manual workload for staff with AI Agent for healthcare.
payer_des_4: AI-powered copilots help CSRs, claims specialists, and agents with conversational workflows, decision trees, nudges, call summarization, knowledgebase optimization & quick retrieval of info from data sources
floatbot_des_3: 50+ analytics on consumption, goals, AI usage, and success metrics
floatbot_des_9: LLM Agentic Framework powered by Agent M
